strategy: Use a gradient-boosting model (e.g., XGBoost or LightGBM) with targeted feature engineering focused on categorical interactions—such as combining passenger class with gender to create "female first class" or "male third class" categories—while applying one-hot encoding with target encoding for rare categories. Additionally, introduce a time-based feature (e.g., survival probability trend by day of the month) derived from historical data patterns to capture temporal dynamics in survival rates.
